form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Statement by YO HAN LEE ( (Cont'd.), File A17 182 973

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 Q. & A. Statement by YO HAN LEE (Cont'd.) In re: YO HAN LEE, File A17 182 973 Q. Now Mr. Lee you stated that you think you can do that. Now I want you to understand that this is your choice that if in the event you want, we will reschedule this hearing with an interpreter in any language that you choose. I want you to understand that you must thoroughly understand all the questions and all of the answers and if not ask them to be repeated or explain. Do you understand sir? A. Well I think if I don't understand I ask for a repeat of that. Q. Does this meet with your approval Mr. Bonapart? ATT'Y. Yes. Q. Now sir, what is your true and correct name please? A. My name is according to Chinese Lee Yo Han according to the custom of being in this country, you know Lee is my family name; my name is Yo Han and that is why according to my passport the Chinese way is Lee Yo Han and now accordin g to the custom of this country it should be Yo Han Lee, something like that. Q. Your family name is Lee? A. My family name yes. My father Lee, my children Lee. That's my family name. Q. When and where were you born sir? A. I was born in China; Shanghai. Q. When were you born sir? A. You mean sir, the date of my birth? Q. Yes sir? A. January 9, 1914. Q. Now sir what country are you a citizen? A. Well, I am holding a Chinese passport. I am Chinese. Q. Have you ever been a citizen or legal resident of any other country? A. Resident yes, Brazil. But I am Chinese. I have a Chinese passport which the inspector the last time I met oh before that time the immigration office has my passport already and is being returned to me. Q. Now sir how long were you resident of Brazil? A. About 12 years. Q. According to the record, you last entered the United States at New York City on April 21, 1968 as a visitor for pleasure. Is that correct sir? Now at the time you last entered the United States, you were granted admission thereto by presenting a nonimmigrant visitor's visa issued to you by the American Consulate in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on March 27, 1968. Is that correct sir? A. Would you please repeat that more slowly and explanation of what you said to me before. -2-
